items.title: Ace lands a bigger bet
items.excerpt: Ace first entered sale negotiations in early 2023 with Portland-based Sortis Holdings, which agreed to buy the brand for roughly USD $85 million. That transaction never closed, with Sortis stating that Ace lost “multiple hotel management contracts, totalling over 20 per cent o…

items.title: The Headland achieves EarthCheck Silver
items.excerpt: UK: Five-star hotel The Headland, located in Cornwall, has been awarded EarthCheck Silver accreditation following a two-day audit process that took place earlier this year.

items.title: Zedwell unveils world’s largest capsule hotel at London Pavilion
items.excerpt: UK: Criterion Capital has opened the first phase of the world’s largest capsule hotel under its Zedwell brand, housed inside the historic London Pavilion at Piccadilly Circus.

items.title: Global Mutual enters hotel investment with platform launch
items.excerpt: Worldwide: Real estate investment manager Global Mutual has launched its hotel investment and asset management platform, Global Mutual Hotels.

items.title: Seibu Prince Hotels acquires Ace Group for $90 million
items.excerpt: US/Japan: Japanese operator Seibu Prince Hotels Worldwide (SPW), a company of Seibu Group, has acquired Ace Group International, parent company of Ace Hotel and its in-house creative agency Atelier Ace.

items.title: Faena New York opens in Manhattan
items.excerpt: US: Luxury hotel Faena New York has opened in Manhattan, two decades after its debut in Buenos Aires and 10 years after its launch in Miami Beach.

items.title: Sabre restructures and announces new partnership with Travelin.Ai
items.excerpt: US: Travel technology company Sabre has confirmed a partnership with blended travel platform Travelin.Ai while also restructuring its sustainability team, which saw the departure of senior executives.

items.title: The Hoxton, Dublin set to open this November
items.excerpt: Ireland: The Hoxton will debut in Ireland this November with a property in Dublin’s Creative Quarter, housed in the former Central Hotel.

items.title: Sir Hotels opens in Devonshire Square, London
items.excerpt: UK: Amsterdam-based boutique hotel group Sir Hotels has opened Sir Devonshire Square, its first hotel in London.

items.title: World’s highest hotel Ciel Dubai Marina to open in November
items.excerpt: UAE: Ciel Dubai Marina, part of IHG’s Vignette Collection, is set to open in November 2025, becoming the world’s tallest hotel at 377 metres with 82 floors and the highest infinity pool.

items.title: Sutton Hotel Collection to refurbish The Castle Hotel Windsor
items.excerpt: UK: Sutton Hotel Collection will invest £9.5 million in a refurbishment programme for The Castle Hotel Windsor, scheduled for completion in late 2026.
